title: Scrap Sword
content:
pon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Crudely forged with mismatched components, nearly rusted through, and plenty sharp.
